text: Norman Brown (born 10 September 1961 in Bankfoot, Perth and Kinross, Scotland) is a Scottish male curler. He is a four-time , silver and bronze medallist, played for the Great Britain team in two Winter Olympics: 1992 (where curling was a demonstration sport; 5th place) and 2002 (7th place). Brown started curling at the age of nine, when the Stranraer rink first opened in 1970. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" width=60| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second !
